textContent: Email body { font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 1.8; color: #2d3748; margin: 0; padding: 40px 20px; background-color: #ffffff; } .container { max-width: 500px; margin: 0 auto; } h1, h2, h3 { color: #1a202c; font-weight: 400; } p { margin-bottom: 20px; } .signature { margin-top: 40px; padding-top: 20px; border-top: 1px solid #e2e8f0; font-style: italic; color: #718096; } a { color: #3182ce; text-decoration: underline; } @media screen and (max-width: 600px) { body { padding: 20px 10px; } } {{#if recipientName}} {{recipientName}}, {{/if}} {{{content}}} {{#if senderName}} — {{senderName}} {{/if}}
